question: birth control question?
question_content:
so my boyfriend is visiting next month, right when im supposed to get my period. im on yaz, so if i skip the sugar pills and go right to the next pack of active pills i will skip my period all together. 

if we have sex, will i bleed? i heard that having sex right around when you're supposed to get your period can induce the bleeding. will that still happen even if im taking the active pills in the next pack?

answers.answer_content: You won't bleed unless you've been skipping sugar pills for like 4 months or more
no u wnt bleed any more or any less just have a towel and mkae sure hes not grossed out by the bleeding and u will be fine.
